publication/authors: Gao D, Morini E, Salani M, Krauson AJ, Chekuri A, Sharma N, Ragavendran A, Erdin S, Logan EM, Li W, Dakka A, Narasimhan J, Zhao X, Naryshkin N, Trotta CR, Effenberger KA, Woll MG, Gabbeta V, Karp G, Yu Y, Johnson G, Paquette WD, Cutting GR, Talkowski ME, Slaugenhaupt SA
publication/title: A deep learning approach to identify gene targets of a therapeutic for human splicing disorders.
dataset/availability: No. However, raw data can be downloaded  as data sets can be of GSE53625 from GEO (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/) and 37 ESCC cases with Asian ancestry from TCGA (UCSC Xena, https://xena.ucsc.edu/).
dataset/splits: Train set of 134 samples, test of 45 samples, and a validation sets consisting of 86 samples. No mention to N_pos or N_neg.
optimization/algorithm: Generalized Linear models, SVM, NN, Random Forests and XGBoost,
optimization/encoding: Normalization according to an external reference Gut. 2014;63(11):1700–10. https://doi.org/10.1136/gutjnl-2013-305806.
evaluation/confidence: Unpaired or paired Student t-test and log-rank tests for Kaplan-Meier
evaluation/method: one training set, one test set and one validation set.
